name: Space Journey (itch) (nemmaemma)
description:
PLAY IN FULL SCREEN

Aim: Shoot all the ships to protect your mothership

  • Regular ships will shoot lasers at you
  • Saucers will try to body slam you
  • Avoid the asteroids 

Controls:
Move - Left and Right Arrow Keys
Aim - Mouse
Shoot - Left Click
Pause - P
Exit - X
